name: A pretty ok fpsc level
description:
I was thinking of rebooting the principality so I downloaded fpsc and while you can make some kinda fun gameplay in fpsc the AI just ruins it it's as thick as pig sh"t.
anyway I wanted to make a level where you keep climbing up and I kinda pulled it off

I also wanted to see if the game would be more fun if you reduce the amount of health the player has and leave medkit everywhere and it is more fun i had to reduce the amount of damage the guns did tho
